mapper.select: SELECT sale_attr_value_id, sku_id, sale_attr_value_name FROM sku_sale_attr_value ssav, sku_info si WHERE ssav.sku_id = si.id AND si.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY si.id, ssav.sale_attr_id

SELECT sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id ASC SEPARATOR '|') value_ids FROM `sku_sale_attr_value` sv JOIN `sku_info` si ON sv.sku_id=si.id WHERE si.spu_id=#{spuId} GROUP BY sku_id
